title: "Assassin"
body:
"thriving in situations when he can follow up on high-impact area of effect abilities."

Rito pls.
"Utility assassin" is basically saying "gigantic tiny person". 
AKA it's bullshit.

I mean, your tags are already meaningless, but it's like you're not even trying.
Like damn. You're making me think the only reason Ekko isn't labeled a *mage* is because you decided to make him AD for literally no reason. Again.
